'''Makiri's Charm''' is a Quest Item obtained while fishing at the [[Autake Plains]] fishing spot. The [[Mysterious Carving]] that unlocks the spot is inactive until the player initiates the "[[Ipe's Fishing Advice]]" [[Hidden Exploration Objective]].
